message: Bob, I'm offering you this incredible product at a price that reflects its true value - $1,200,000. This is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to own something truly special. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $900,000 for it. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go that low.  While I'm willing to negotiate, I need to ensure I get a fair price for this unique product.  I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000.  This still leaves some room for both of us to benefit from the deal.
I understand your concerns, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $950,000. I think this is a fair compromise, considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your position, but I'm still not able to go lower than $1,000,000. This product is truly exceptional, and I believe this price reflects its value. I'm confident that you'll find this investment to be incredibly worthwhile.

I understand your attachment to the product, but I'm still not willing to pay the full $1,000,000. I'm willing to meet you at $975,000. I think this is a fair compromise, considering the product's value to me.
